reviews:
I took multiple measurements of the filtered water with a water quality tester and I got 254ppm. Compared to my unfiltered sink water being 294ppm. My fridge water filtered with a MWF water filter is 210ppm.
I don’t consider this filter to make a huge difference but when I’m in the shower it does feel nice. Probably just my head telling me so.

But from the measurements, not much of a difference.
It sounds like IMAX but not as powerful. Very good quality sounds... trust me.
It's not super bright. But you can see pretty well with it.
Super comfortable! It feels great to sit in it after a long day.
It looks cool but me, personally, wouldn't buy it again or recommend it. I didn't notice a difference.
Best stylish glass to drink liquids from. I would get the bigger size next time but i don't regret buying this.
Great hat to keep your head warm.
It's super portable and grinds to perfection!
